Asian shares cautious as oil jumps on US strikes in YemenAsian shares were cautious on Friday as the escalating conflict in the Red Sea region sent oil prices surging, while slightly higher-than-expected U.S. inflation data did not dent investors' views on early and aggressive rate cuts in the U.S. and Europe. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:21:34 GMT TW2E3RVBFRNL3MBXVOOONTCSZM https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-01-12/Stella Qiu市场
Taiwan says it spotted more Chinese balloons over strait, a day ahead of voteTaiwan's defence ministry said on Friday it detected five Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait over the past 24 hours, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 02:17:56 GMT QY3OI3K4AROYPGO5ORXEEVR23M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-says-it-spotted-more-chinese-balloons-over-straight-day-ahead-vote-2024-01-12/Reuters世界亚太地区
Tesla drops prices of some new China Model 3 and Model Y carsThe price of Tesla's new China Model 3 dropped to 245,900 yuan, and the price of the Model Y dropped to 258,900 yuan, as of Jan. 12, according to the company's website. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 01:13:06 GMT EZ3SR565FRIQPHAV35ZD4PMPL4 https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/tesla-drops-prices-some-new-china-model-3-model-and-cars-2024-01-12/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Dollar steady as markets assess higher-than-expected US CPIThe dollar held steady against peer currencies on Friday, as investors weighed higher-than-expected U.S. consumer price inflation against market bets that the Federal Reserve will cut rates as soon as March. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 01:02:24 GMT CNMBRTVAPNNWTL4HKIJQIWTGEU https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-steady-markets-assess-higher-than-expected-us-cpi-2024-01-12/Brigid Riley市场货币
China is open to contact, talks with Canada, foreign minister saysChina does not want a continuation of the "current difficult situation" in relations with Canada, China's foreign minister told his Canadian counterpart during a phone call, the Chinese foreign ministry said in a statement late on Thursday. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 23:37:56 GMT YQHODUO3UNKVLM3QNOUF7UNKPY https://www.reuters.com/world/china-is-opening-contacts-dialogue-with-canada-chinas-foreign-minister-2024-01-11/Reuters世界
